design_system.style: Minimal, clean line icons with consistent stroke weight
design_system.aesthetic: Quiet, professional design matching New Haven Pilates brand

usage_notes.formats: SVG for scalability, PNG for compatibility, WebP for performance
usage_notes.recommended_use: Use WebP format for web with PNG fallback
usage_notes.color_customization: Stroke color can be changed via CSS or SVG editing
usage_notes.accessibility: All icons are simple line art suitable for high contrast modes
